page.title: 12SPORT IN BOURNEMOUTH
page.content: THERE ARE MANY INTERESTING FACTS ABOUT SPORT IN BOURNEMOUTH, FOR EXAMPLE, BOURNEMOUTH HAS HAD A TEAM IN THE FOOTBALL LEAGUE FOR WELL OVER 50 YEARS BUT THEY HAVE NEVER SUCCEEDED IN GETTING HIGHER THAN THE THIRD DIVISION. THERE HAVE BEEN SOME NOTABLE F.A. CUP EXPERIENCES, HOWEVER, AND IN THE PAST THEY HAVE BEATEN FIRST DIVISION TEAMS LIKE MANCHESTER UNITED, SPURS, WOLVERHAMPTON AND NEWCASTLE. AT THE MOMENT HARRY REDKNAPP IS BOURNEMOUTH'S MANAGER AND THEY PLAY AT DEAN COURT WHERE AVERAGE GATES ARE APPROXIMATELY 3,500 WITH A HIGHEST EVER ATTENDANCE OF 25,000. HAMPSHIRE CRICKET CLUB OFTEN PLAY MATCHES AT DEAN PARK AND MANY NOTABLE WORLD CLASS PLAYERS HAVE PLAYED THERE INCLUDING SIR LEN HUTTON, COLIN COUDREY, IAN BOTHAM AND GARY SOBERS.
